nodes.text: Hylemane Lightbringer was a regent of the Old Republic. History 'crons recorded fantastic claims such as he was "born in the dust of the Typhonic Nebula" and that he "could not be killed by mortal weapons," the last being proven untrue when he was bludgeoned to death by a chair.
Hylemane Lightbringer was first mentioned in Aftermath, a 2015 canon novel written by Chuck Wendig.
